product_name: BioLite SiteLight Portable LED Lanterns - Package of 2
long_description: This ultralight daisy-chainable lighting system integrates seamlessly with the BioLite PowerLight hub (sold separately) for a full spectrum of versatile--and portable--campsite illumination.
short_description: This ultralight daisy-chainable lighting system integrates seamlessly with the BioLite PowerLight hub (sold separately) for a full spectrum of versatile--and portable--campsite illumination.
